title: How to enable Google Assistant quick phrases on your Pixel phone to save time
description: If you want a more efficient interaction with Google Assistant, you'll want to enable quick phrases.

title: How to use Apple's new iCloud Shared Photo Library (and why you should)
description: Save yourself precious time in the future by setting up Apple's new shared photo library that can automatically share photos with up to five people.

title: You can now use Venmo to make purchases on Amazon
description: Right in time for holiday shopping, you will be able to select Venmo as a payment method when making Amazon purchases.

description: Here's a quick tour of a Linux distribution built specifically for those who create audio and video content.

description: While Samsung offered pre-order deals, this is the first actual drop in price since its release.

title: APAC faces 2.1M shortage in cybersecurity professionals
description: Asia-Pacific region sees greatest growth in cybersecurity workforce, but still struggles to fill a gap of more than 2.16 million with 60% of organisations reporting a significant shortage in security staff, according to a study released by ISC2.

description: You don't have to choose between streaming movies and displaying art. Right now, you can save $500 on Samsung's 55-inch The Frame TV on Amazon.

title: Remote work still has problems. Can Webex fix them?
description: Virtual collaboration tools have come a long way since the pandemic started, but Cisco exec Jeetu Patel says we're still in the "first inning" of figuring out remote and hybrid work.

title: Get help with Garmin inReach: 10,000 SOS incidents responded to across the globe

title: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5 hands-on: This looks familiar...
description: Microsoft's fifth edition of its Surface Laptop comes in essentially the same package as the previous two generations. In this early look, we start to get a feel if it's a case of sticking with what works, or Microsoft being stuck in a rut.

title: Microsoft Surface Pro 9 review: Impressive but is it worth the price of an M2 MacBook Air?
description: With the Surface Pro 9, the Arm-based variant is no longer an afterthought. But most users will still find greater use for the Intel-based model, especially when working from an office.

title: Australia seeks stiffer penalty for data breaches amidst spate of security incidents
description: Government says it will push up maximum fines for serious or repeated data privacy breaches to AU$50 million, up from the current AU$2.22 million, in a move that follows a spate of cybersecurity incidents that compromised customer data, including Medibank.
